title: First Mover Asia: Bitcoin Retreats, Quickly Regains $30K Perch as Investors Mull ETF Timing, Inflation
description: ALSO: Fast-paced, entrepreneurial Seoul ranked fourth globally in CoinDesk's crypto hub series. Korea's digital asset friendly, regulatory environment and a vibrant retail community have helped enabled the industry's rising prominence in the city.

title: Cardano ($ADA) Faces a 50% Plunge Against Bitcoin Based on Historical Data, Crypto Analyst Suggests
description: In a sobering analysis, popular cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin Cowen has revealed that he believes the price of Cardano’s native token, $ADA, could see its value drop 50% against that of the flagship cryptocurrency Bitcoin ($BTC). title: Crypto Exchange Binance’s Motion to Restrain SEC’s Public Statements Denied
description: Binance’s attempt to prevent the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) from making public statements alleging that the crypto exchange mishandled U.S. customers’ assets has been denied by the judge overseeing its enforcement case. A former SEC head of internet enforcement warned that the motion may “prompt the criminal authorities to expedite whatever action, if […]
